jhelp.util.gui

Class JavaFileSelection

  • java.lang.Object
    • jhelp.util.gui.JavaFileSelection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.datatransfer.Transferable

    public class JavaFileSelection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.datatransfer.Transferable
    Java file list selection in drag and drop operation between Swing GUI and Operating System

    Last modification : 9 aoet 2010
    Version 0.0.0
    Author:
    JHelp
